overview: "Yo soy campeón” narrates the epic of the Chacarita Juniors, champion of the Metropolitan Tournament of 1969, beating River Plate in the final. The film narrates the period that goes from the victory achieved in the classic with Atlanta in the Metropolitano 1967, a result that allowed avoiding relegation to the Second Division, until the consecration on the Racing Club field, with the 4-1 victory over River Plate , in the final of the Metro, two years later.
title: Yo soy campeón
